review: My boyfriend gave me gonorrhea. I went to get treatment and received an injection of rocephin in my arm. I'm usually good with needles BUT this was one of the most painful injections I've ever received in my life. Especially the second after they remove the needle. I felt like my soul come out of my body in agonizing pain! I started to have tremors and the doctor kept asking me if i was okay but I couldn't take the pain anymore. I didn't scream or anything I held it down I guess thats why it hurts so much more! I think if you get it in the butt it will hurt less. But this stuff hurts and I am not joking! hoping it works. STAY SAFE GUYS

Rocephin (ceftriaxone):I picked up Gonorrhea... received one shot of Ceftriaxone in combination with oral Azithromycin. The needle was huge but I didnâ€™t feel ANYTHING. Started clearing up the infection almost immediately. 12+ hours later and still no pain... there must have been a lot of Lidocaine mixed in.

I was treated by this med ceftriaxone because of gonorrhea and I had worst side effects, I felt weak and tired after 2 days taking the antibiotic and it last weeks.  Did anyone experience the same side effects.!?

Rocephin (ceftriaxone):Found out I had Gonorrhea.  Doctor prescribed this and antibiotic pills pills (doxy).  The shot is NOT as painful as everyone says, especially if you take precautions:  1. Insist that the mix the shot with lidocaine, 2.  Ice it when you get home, ice it before bed.  I got it in the left arm and I was rock climbing the next day.Symptoms decreased significantly 6 hours after the shot.

Rocephin (ceftriaxone):My daughter was given this injection for Gonorrhea the injection was very painful it caused nausea, but she does feel a lot better no more dark color urine or smelly discharge it works
Rocephin (ceftriaxone):Worked so fast that before I left office I felt better
